definition: to leave behind/to stay behind/to remain/to keep/not to let (sb) go
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The recipient will be left with multiple half-open connections that are occupying limited resources.
sentences.chinese: 收件人将留下多个半开连接占用有限的资源。

sentences.english: The papal captain have vainly endeavoured to induce his wife to remain behind him .
sentences.chinese: 教廷的队长曾白费力气地试图说服妻子留下不去。

sentences.english: That apparently made quite an impression on the president's young daughter.
sentences.chinese: 着很显然给总统的小女儿留下了很深的印象。

sentences.english: Then, several motorcycle march off, leaving the engine sound.
sentences.chinese: 接着，几台摩托车扬长而去，留下阵阵的引擎声。

sentences.english: Of the original scheme hardly a wrack remains.
sentences.chinese: 原来的计划几乎一点残迹也未留下。
只留下一个冰冷的梦境。

sentences.english: A black dress person into Cao Zhai night, stole Cao Fu a picture, and leave a mark.
sentences.chinese: 一黑衣人夜入曹宅，盗走曹父的一幅画，并留下记号。

sentences.english: Is Bonasera the only one left?
sentences.chinese: 勃纳瑟拉是仅有的一个被留下来的？

sentences.english: Is the sky in memory of Feiyan, flew over, they left off.
sentences.chinese: 记忆是天空中的飞雁，飞过，便留下过。

sentences.english: This leaves time in each task for the manual delivery of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 这为每个任务留下了手工交付书面文档的时间。

sentences.english: Every day of your life is a page of your history.
sentences.chinese: 你生命中的每一天，都在你的历史上留下一页。

sentences.english: Well,Simon,you certainly made a good impression on that customer.
sentences.chinese: 干得好，赛蒙，你一定给客户留下了一个好印象。

sentences.english: The hackers then follow their marks as they move to their online bank accounts.
sentences.chinese: 黑客就可以根据木马留下的记号跟踪他们的网银账号。

sentences.english: He leaves with a record of 39-6 with 30 knockouts .
sentences.chinese: 他留下了创记录的39胜6败，30次击倒对手。

sentences.english: When you gonna leave bors and come home with me?
sentences.chinese: 你准备什么时候留下鲍斯跟我回家？

sentences.english: I remember hours of acne fast right next coated, printed pox will not leave.
sentences.chinese: 下次记得痘痘快好的时分涂，就不会留下痘印了。

definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to ask sb to stay/to keep sb for the night/to await (classical)
